Kyle Jamicic

Your Chicago Real Estate Advocate

find out more

About

Kyle has the resources to generate demand for seller's properties and provide buyers with up to date information they need. He prides himself in excellent listening and communication skills, as well as being an expert negotiator. Through Coldwell Banker's internet marketing programs, Kyle is dedicated to selling home quickly and for the best possible price. To satisfy both buyers and sellers, Kyle's listings offer multiple photos and detailed information; the top two most desired features in online listings. He makes it a point to educate buyers and sellers in important real estate information so they understand what is to be expected. Kyle understands that every transaction is different and is determined to find each of his clients' unique needs. Kyle is passionate about real estate and committed to your success. He makes it a point to research real estate news and attend continuing education to stay informed on today's real estate market in order to increase his knowledge. Kyle will not stop working until your property is sold.
